income_messages:
From: m*********5@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-19 23:12:22
SUBJECT:   Hello
  Hello
I’m Zhanna Monastyrskyy, wife of late interior minister Denys Monastyrskyy who died in a helicopter plane crash .
I need your attention and assistance in the distribution of my late husband’s wealth . My gallant husband who served the Ukraine government was involved in a ghastly helicopter accident which led to his death in January 2023 . Before his death , I have been bedridden with cancer, a condition which I have been managing and treating for a long time but has gotten to an unmanageable stage with a proposed life expectancy of not more than two
months handed over to me .. However my husband , given his financial exposure with the government, willed his funds and a house in the USA to me . I have no intention of selling the house but rather my intention is to donate the funds to a reputable charity organization in the states which can be done by proxy since I’m currently not in the state .
If you’re willing to assist , kindly reply back for more details as I will reward you financially for assisting in the project or helping the poor and needy .
Thank you
Zhanna   
From: m*********5@gmail.com
To: fo39540@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-19 23:15:03
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
My Dear  Lorene
My heart is satisfied with you receiving this fund. I cannot trust anyone
further except you. I am very much convinced of what you can do .Thank you
very very much for being here for me .
This is what you need to do now to enable you to receive the funds on my
behalf from the security company. First of all ,thanks for your confident
response in receiving this fund and using it for the said purpose. I would
like you to contact the security company where this fund is deposited, and
contact them by sending them an email, I have notified them today of your
contact to them.
For security measures to avoid fraudsters/scammers intruding in this ,they
gave me the information below to give to you,which you will include in the
email you will send to them.
Secret Question: What Year
Charity Answer: zhann
Amount. 45'000'000.00 USD
Security Code:2016
The information's above is what you need to send to them and they will
write you back telling you what to do to receive the funds.
You can as well include your phone number just in-case they want to call
you.
Below is their contact information
Name of Company. Innovest Portfolio Solutions, LLC
Name of Director of the Fund Transfer Unit. Rick Rodger
Email.
*customerserviceinnovestportfolio@hotmail.com*
<customerserviceinnovestportfolio@hotmail.com>
My Dear please email the security company and get back to me. My dear my
trust is in you and I know that you will not disappoint me ,always pray for
me .
Stay blessed
Zhann
From: m*********5@gmail.com
To: fo39540@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-20 06:18:03
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
My dear
I am currently at the hospital and the pain I am going through is
unbearable, please contact the security company to enable you to receive my
funds before I pass away. According to my last medical reports, my days in
this earth are numbered.
Lastly, no risk involved, infact it's 💯% risk free .
I will send you my pictures in subsequent email.
I am relying on you don't let me down. Contact the security company now and
get back to me.
Stay blessed and continue to pray for me.
Yours sick sister
Zahnna
From: m*********5@gmail.com
To: fo39540@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-20 08:03:18
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Please can you contact the security company now .? . Time is of essence
From: m*********5@gmail.com
To: fo39540@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-20 14:38:16
SUBJECT: Re: Hello
Joker

SUBJECT: Re:   Hello

Best wishes,
Lorene

Best wishes,
Lorene

Best wishes,
Lorene

Best wishes,
Lorene
